name: React-polar-gg
tagline: Grammar of graphics inspired visualisations for React
body:
react-es6-gg
============

A visualisation library that implements a grammar of graphics. Written in ReactJS + Ecmascript 6.

It was originally written to plot monthly data onto a variety of polar plot but got expanded to support a variety of plots onto a variety of coordinates. 

Modular architecture. New graph elements are easy to add.

[react-es6-gg@github](https://github.com/widged/react-es6-gg)

Preview
=======
![library preview](preview.png "Library Preview")

Plotting monthly statistics on different coordinates

![months preview](months.png "Months Preview")

Author
======

Marielle Lange @widged


Credits
======

Polar plots adapted from @biovisualise micropolar library.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
